item.title: About Us
item.description: Trustle is where we write blogs about different things. For example cooking tips, great recipes, fitness hacks, game suggestions & product reviews.

item.title: Privacy Policy of Trustle
item.description: Trustle operates the https://thetrustle.com/ website, which provides the SERVICE. This page is used to inform website visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Trustle website. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect are used for providing and improving the Service.

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description: Welcome to Trustle! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Trustle's Website, located at https://thetrustle.com/. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Trustle if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "
